titleStmt.title: The usefulness of the stage, to the happiness of mankind, to government, and to religion occasioned by a late book written by Jeremy Collier, M.A. / by Mr. Dennis.
titleStmt.author: Dennis, John, 1657-1734.
Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726. Short view of the immorality and profaneness of the English stage.
